001package ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
004
005/**
006 * Output port for poster pipelines that emit rendered protocol transcripts.
007 *
008 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
009 */
010public interface PosterOutputPort extends AutoCloseable {
011  /**
012   * Writes a rendered poster report to the downstream sink.
013   *
014   * @param report poster payload containing protocol metadata and content
015   * @throws Exception if writing fails
016   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
017   */
018  void write(PosterReport report) throws Exception;
019
020  /**
021   * Closes the output port.
022   *
023   * @throws Exception if shutdown fails
024   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
025   */
026  @Override
027  default void close() throws Exception {}
028
029  /**
030   * Immutable representation of a rendered poster output.
031   *
032   * @param protocol protocol associated with the rendered transaction
033   * @param txId stable identifier for the transaction/message pair
034   * @param timestampMicros emission timestamp in microseconds since epoch
035   * @param content rendered content (e.g., HTML, plain text)
036   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
037   */
038  record PosterReport(ProtocolId protocol, String txId, long timestampMicros, String content) {
039    /**
040     * Validates poster report invariants.
041     *
042     * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
043     */
044    public PosterReport {
045      if (protocol == null) {
046        throw new IllegalArgumentException("protocol must not be null");
047      }
048      if (txId == null || txId.isBlank()) {
049        throw new IllegalArgumentException("txId must not be blank");
050      }
051      if (content == null) {
052        throw new IllegalArgumentException("content must not be null");
053      }
054    }
055  }
056}
